name: NecroDetective
description:
This is a school project. All of the sprites are created by me.

The game is still a super early WIP, so it is no where near complete, but even with all it's bad bugs, there is enough of the game to understand what I'm going for. The game is glitchy, but I hope you can find it a bit interesting regardless.  

Fixes that I'm still working on: Jumping, shaking player sprite, stomping zombies, life system, and time.

I'm still working on background scenery, title screen art, and finding sounds/music.
